Row.Text: Troops march in as you topple the Earth Kingdom Capital. As plans to assimilate the new citizens are laid out a fight breaks out. One general argues that the Earth Kingdom citizens might have some ideas worth borrowing, while another insists that differences must be ironed out to ensure cohesion.
Unlock a unique Earth Kingdom Tradition, {LOC_TRADITION_EARTH_KINGDOM_EXCESSIVE_TAX_DESCRIPTION}
Demand food offerings for our great leader.
Unlock a unique Earth Kingdom Tradition, {LOC_TRADITION_EARTH_KINGDOM_FEED_THE_QUEEN_DESCRIPTION}
Increase trade to expand our coffers.
Unlock a unique Earth Kingdom Tradition, {LOC_TRADITION_EARTH_KINGDOM_OMASHU_DELIVERY_SYSTEM_DESCRIPTION}
Our people stand strong against all invaders.
Unlock a unique Earth Kingdom Tradition, {LOC_TRADITION_EARTH_KINGDOM_THE_HUNDRED_YEARS_WAR_DESCRIPTION}
Send the first general back to the field.
